articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola agrees a one-year extension to take his stay at the club to 10 seasons.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City manager agrees one-year contract extension

articles.description: Live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Wales vs Iceland in the Uefa Nations League.
articles.title: Nations League: Wales make four changes for Iceland test

articles.description: Follow live text commentary from the Davis Cup as the Netherlands face Rafael Nadal's Spain in the quarter-final in Malaga, Spain.
articles.title: Davis Cup LIVE: Rafael Nadal in action for Spain v Netherlands - live text commentary

articles.description: Rafael Nadal loses in what might prove to be the final match of his career as Davis Cup hosts Spain fall behind against the Netherlands.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal: Retiring superstar loses for Spain at farewell Davis Cup

articles.description: Liverpool midfielder Dominik Szoboszlai scores a 'Panenka' penalty in the 99th minute of stoppage time as Hungary grab a late equaliser to deny Germany.
articles.title: Dominik Szoboszlai's late penalty for Hungary denies Germany in Nations League

articles.description: Great Britain move closer to a place in the Billie Jean King Cup final for the first time in 43 years after Emma Raducanu wins the opener against Slovakia.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup 2024: Emma Raducanu moves Great Britain closer to Malaga final

articles.description: Chelsea condemn the "unacceptable and hateful homophobic comments" aimed at Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis after the couple said they are expecting a baby.
articles.title: Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis baby: Chelsea condemn 'hateful and homophobic comments'

articles.description: Roger Federer says Rafael Nadal "made the whole tennis world proud" during his "epic career" before the Spaniard's retirement.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal retires: Roger Federer pays tribute to Spaniard for 'epic career'

articles.description: Botswana, Mozambique and Tanzania become the final three qualifiers for the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations in Morocco.
articles.title: Afcon 2025: Botswana, Mozambique and Tanzania round off qualifiers for finals

articles.description: England centre Ollie Lawrence says former boss Eddie Jones' criticism made him raise his game to meet the demands of Test rugby.
articles.title: England v Japan: Ollie Lawrence says Eddie Jones' criticism made him a better player
